channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FEMA Faces Stormy Weather over Migrant Funding
item.description: In the devastating aftermath of Hurricane Helene, and with another monster storm bearing down on Florida, the issue of how the Federal Emergency Manag...

item.title: There’s a Reason Harris’ Campaign Is Locked in on Quick Fixes
item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.

item.title: Kelly becomes second former general who served under Trump to say GOP nominee is ‘fascist’
WSJ's Tech Live: Andreessen Partner Sounds Alarm on America's AI Policy
item.description: The venture-capital firm’s Martin Casado says neither Kamala Harris nor Donald Trump has offered a clear vision on the technology.

item.title: As Democratic icons stump for Harris, GOP elders keep distance from Trump
item.description: Four Democratic presidents, among other leaders, are all in for Harris. On the Republican side, Trump embraces his break with the party establishment.

item.title: Meta Bans Accounts That Track Celebrity Jet Travel, Including for Zuckerberg
item.description: The suspensions mirror decision Elon Musk made in 2022 to ban similar accounts on Twitter after he acquired the platform.

item.title: Meet Hollywood's AI Doomsayer: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
item.description: The actor says AI companies use movies and TV to make money without fairly compensating actors and the industry should “get ahead of that flood.”

item.title: Fed moves to protect weakening job market with bold rate cut
item.description: The move signals that the central bank is growing nervous about the declining labor market.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on iQiyi, Zomato, ZTE and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Biden touts economic gains, acknowledges a long way to go
item.description: Interest rate cut "is not a declaration of victory, it’s a declaration of progress."

item.title: Trump hosts Latino supporters, holds rally; Harris tapes TV interviews
item.description: Get the latest news from the 2024 campaign trail in the contest between Vice President Kamala Harris and former president Donald Trump.

item.title: In close race that could tip House, candidates fight for the center
item.description: How the fight for Oregon’s 5th Congressional District could determine the balance of power on Capitol Hill.

item.title: Madness: Illegal Alien Dodges Deportation FIVE Times
item.description: Few events in recent memory highlight the absurdity of sanctuary policies more than the case of Yohandri Roger Mosquera-Rosas, a 30-year-old Venezuela...

item.title: The Harmful Impact of Mass Illegal Migration on Native Tribes from Panama to the U.S.
item.description: In an age of Intersectionality, a doctrine that divides the world into the oppressed and oppressors, adherents view open-borders and unfettered mass m...

item.title: Apple Intelligence Isn't Very Smart Yet---and Apple's OK With That
item.description: Our columnist reviews the first wave of AI features coming to iPhones with iOS 18.1, and asks Apple’s software chief why so much is still missing.

item.title: The Threat of “Liquid Meth” and the Open Border
item.description: Open borders allow the entry of not only massive numbers of illegal aliens, but also the large-scale smuggling and importation of dangerous drugs. Whi...

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: McDonald’s where Trump served fries hit with flurry of bad Yelp reviews
item.description: Yelp disabled comments on the Pennsylvania McDonald’s after a string of politicized reviews. “Stunned to see a convicted felon operating the drive thr...

item.title: Foreign Gangs Bring Our Cities Close to War
